channel.title: Tender offer on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Tender offer on FinanClub

item.title: BBD
item.description: score:44 Chances: Brazil’s hugely popular Pix payment system has become the country’s favorite way to pay, threatening the dominance of credit cards in the booming e-commerce sector. The instant payments designed by Brazil’s central bank are a boon to online retailers, helping with cash flow and undercutting the legacy business of banks and fintechs built on existing credit card infrastructure.
